title: My Jesus, I Love Thee

author.name: William R. Featherston
author.bio: William Ralph Featherston was a Canadian hymn writer who is best known for his hymn 'My Jesus, I Love Thee', which he is believed to have written when he was only 16 years old.

lyrics:
1. My Jesus, I love Thee,
I know Thou art mine,
For Thee all the follies
Of sin I resign;
My gracious Redeemer
My Saviour art Thou;
lf ever I loved Thee,
My Jesus, 'tis now.

2. I love Thee because
Thou hast first loved me,
And purchased my pardon
On Calvary's tree;
I love Thee for wearing
The thorns on Thy brow;
lf ever I loved Thee,
My Jesus 'tis now.

3. I'll love Thee in life,
I will love Thee in death,
And praise Thee as long
As Thou lendest me breath;
And say when the death dew
Lies cold on my brow,
lf ever I loved Thee,
My Jesus, 'tis now.

4. In mansions of glory
And endless delight
l'll ever adore Thee
In Heaven so bright;
l'll sing with the glittering
Crown on my brow,
lf ever I loved Thee,
My Jesus, 'tis now.
